EmailTemplate.name: Cognism notification Analyse CRM.
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Organization.Name} Analyse CRM Issue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
{!Organization.Name}'s SF App Analyse CRM session has not made any progress for 24 hours. Please investigate.
Org ID: {!Organization.Id} Session ID: {!cogn__Clean_Job__c.cogn__Session_Id__c}
Regards, Salesforce App Bot
